Description:
VAM Systems is currently looking for Sr. Business Analyst for our Bahrain operations with the following skillsets & terms and conditions:Skills & QualificationsArabic speaker
Bachelor Degree preferably Engineering background
5+ years of experience in similar projects
Experience in government sector
Excellent communications skills both written and verbal
UX designing
Hands on with any of the popular wireframing tools like – wire framesketcher, Balsamiq, Mockingbird, pencil or similar tool
Able to define the lifecycle, deliverables, tasks and templates that should be included in business analysis process.
Able to select the right tools for each phase of the business analysis processes (brainstorming, benchmarking, data flow diagram, process modelling, and prototyping ….etc.).
Excellent ability to elicit the stakeholder actual needs not simply their expressed desires.Roles & Responsibility:To analyze and synthesize information provided by customer who will interact with the business.
To develop and document a detailed understanding of user workflow and elicit business requirements.
To recommend appropriate technical or business solutions to the project team to ensure a high level of satisfaction.
To conduct demo sessions for users, generate user guides and training manuals, and deliver training sessions as required.
To validate that the solution has met the customer needs.
To Work on problems of diverse scope where analysis of data requires evaluation of multiple factors.
To own and maintain the user stories and requirements log in JIRA or any other tool.
To work with project manager, development and QA to help plan and define sprints to deliver the prioritized requirements
Gather requirements for process or system improvement.
Plan how the requirement will be approached, traced and prioritized.
Determine which steps can and should be automated or improved for maximum benefit.
Document the requirements of the system, both at a high level and a more detail.
Prepare the system use cases and design screens.
Provide inputs to development to scope and build prototype/proof of concept solutions and involve the users to obtain feedback
Act as a contact point, or “translator” between technical teams and business users to ensure process/system changes will integrate effectively into the overall business process.
Assistance with testing, implementation and training.Terms and conditionsJoining time frame: (15 - 30 days)The selected candidates shall join VAM Systems - Bahrain and shall be deputed to one of the Organizations in Bahrain.Terms and conditions: Joining time frame:   maximum 4 weeksJob Details
